text: Michael "Mike" Ostrowski is an American television producer and screenwriter best known for his work on serial drama Jericho and CSI spin-off CSI: Miami, both of which he has worked on as a producer and screenwriter. He currently serves as co-executive producer on NBC's The Blacklist. As a producer, he has worked on the series Jericho, E-Ring and CSI: Miami, serving as supervising producer, producer and co-producer respectively. His writing credits are again for CSI: Miami and Jericho, and also for Private Practice and The District. ==External links== * Category:American television producers Category:American television writers Category:American male screenwriters Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:American male television writers
title: Mike Ostrowski
